import './company-signup.css' export default function CompanySignup() { const closeDiv = () => { if (window.confirm('Are you sure you want to close this window?')) history.push('/admin/companies') } const handleSubmit = (values) => { AdminService.createCompany( values.name, values.email, values.password ).then( () => { alert("The company was created successfully.") history.push('/admin/companies') window.location.reload() }, error => { if (error.response.data.response) { if (error.response.data.response.includes("email") || error.response.data.errorCode === 'USR-006.001') { setTimeout(() => { alert("A user with the email \"" + values.email + "\" already exists,\nPlease choose a different email.") }, 0) } else if (error.response.data.response.includes("name")) setTimeout(() => { alert("A company with the name \"" + values.name + "\" already exists,\nPlease choose a different name.") }, 0) else setTimeout(() => { alert("Action Failed\n" + error.response.data.response) }, 0) return } if (error.response) { setTimeout(() => { alert("Login expired, please login again.") }, 0) AuthenticationService.logOut(); } else setTimeout(() => { alert("Servers are currently down, try again later.") }, 0) }) } return ( <>
Create A New Company
{({ values }) => (
Name
Email
Password
)}
) }
